io.github.teamfractal.entity

Class Market

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.entity.Market

  • public class Market
extends java.lang.Object
    Players can use the market to buy and sell resources, roboticons and roboticon customisation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Market()
      Initialise the market

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean attemptToProduceRoboticon()
      If the market has enough ore then that ore will be converted into a roboticon and this method will return true.
      void buyResource(ResourceType resource, int amount)
      Buy Resource from the market, caller must be doing all the checks.
      int getBuyPrice(ResourceType resource)
      Get the price that the market will pay a player for a single unit of a given resource.

      Get the amount of specific resource.
      int getSellPrice(ResourceType resource)
      Get the price that a player must pay the market for a single unit of a given resource.
      GamblingResult playerGamble(Player player, int bet)
      There is a 50/50 chance of winning.
      void sellResource(ResourceType resource, int amount)
      Sell Resource from the market, caller must be doing all the checks.

    • Method Detail

      • getResource

        public int getResource(ResourceType type)
        Get the amount of specific resource.
        Parameters:
        type - The ResourceType.
        Returns:
        The amount.

      • getBuyPrice

        public int getBuyPrice(ResourceType resource)
        Get the price that the market will pay a player for a single unit of a given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The ResourceType.
        Returns:
        The buy in price.

      • getSellPrice

        public int getSellPrice(ResourceType resource)
        Get the price that a player must pay the market for a single unit of a given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The ResourceType.
        Returns:
        The sell price.

      • buyResource

        public void buyResource(ResourceType resource,
                        int amount)
        Buy Resource from the market, caller must be doing all the checks. For example, take money away from the player. This method will only increase the amount of specified resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The ResourceType
        amount - The amount of resource to buy in.

      • sellResource

        public void sellResource(ResourceType resource,
                         int amount)
        Sell Resource from the market, caller must be doing all the checks. For example, add money in to the player. This method will only decrease the amount of specified resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The ResourceType
        amount - The amount of resource to sell out.

      • attemptToProduceRoboticon

        public boolean attemptToProduceRoboticon()
        If the market has enough ore then that ore will be converted into a roboticon and this method will return true. Otherwise nothing will happen and it will return false.
        Returns:

      • playerGamble

        public GamblingResult playerGamble(Player player,
                                   int bet)
        There is a 50/50 chance of winning. If the player wins the amount of money specified by the bet is added to their inventory, if they lose then the amount of money specified by the bet is removed from their inventory. Players cannot place a bet unless they have at least as much money as specified by the bet
        Parameters:
        player - the gambling Player
        bet -
        Returns:
        GamblingResult.NOTENOUGHMONEY if the player does not have enough money and GamblingResult.WON or GamblingResult.LOST otherwise
